feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-29T17:34:04.179672Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Valve 禁止 Steam 中使用 AI 生成图形或文本的游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/aigamedev/comments/142j3yt/valve_is_not_willing_to_publish_games_with_ai/< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T16:30:59.246855Z</更新>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/aigamedev/comments/142j3yt/valve_is_not_willing_to_publish_games_with_ai/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Wouter33</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Wouter33</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //www.redditstatic.com/new-icon.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Valve 已禁止在 Steam 上发布使用人工智能生成的图形或文本的游戏。该禁令是在一名开发商试图发布一款带有明显由人工智能生成的资产的游戏后发布的。开发商手工改进了资产，但游戏仍然被拒绝。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#valve-bans-games-using-ai- generated-graphics-or-text-from-steam" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36522665" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;首次发现怪物引力波</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586 -023-02167-7</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T15:30:59.248355Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02167- 7"/>; <作者>; <名称>;throw0101c</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=throw0101c</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://media.nature.com/lw767/magazine-assets/d41586-023-02167-7/d41586-023-02167-7_25547164.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;研究人员有可能使用一种追踪地球和脉冲星之间距离变化的新技术重新发现阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦的引力波。检测到的波比2015年发现的波更强、更长，波长可达数十光年。多个合作已经报告了类似的结果，如果得到证实，这一发现将提供超大质量黑洞双星的存在及其产生可测量引力波的能力的证据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#monster-gravitational-waves-spotted-for-first-time" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36520925" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;超越编程语言</stitle>; <id>;https://whileydave.com/2023/06/27/programming-languages-going-above- and-beyond/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.248750Z</更新>; <link href="https://whileydave.com/2023/06/27/programming-languages-going-上面和超越/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rrampage </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rrampage</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://whileydave.com/images/2023/DafnyAbove_Preview.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：151px；" />;<br />;这些年来，编程语言并没有太大的改进，只有很小的改进。然而，还有很大改进的潜力。 Dafny 是一种超越主流语言所能做到的语言，能够静态检查程序的关键属性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#programming-languages-going-above-and-beyond" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36519497" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;维克里拍卖</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vickrey_auction</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T16:30： 59.249757Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vickrey_auction"/>; <作者>; <名称>;EricButton</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=EricButton</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Microcosm_of_London_Plate_006_-_Auction_Room %2C_Christie%27s_%28colour%29.jpg/150px-Microcosm_of_London_Plate_006_-_Auction_Room%2C_Christie%27s_%28colour%29.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：166px；" />;<br />;维克里拍卖或密封投标第二价格拍卖 (SBSPA) 是密封投标拍卖的一种。投标人在不知道拍卖中其他人的出价的情况下提交书面出价。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#vickrey-auction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36522182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Awk 编程语言，第二版</stitle>; <id>;https://awk.dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T08:30:59.250142Z</更新>; <link href="https://awk.dev/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;0x54MUR41 </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=0x54MUR41 </uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;《AWK 编程语言》第二版反映了自 1988 年第一版编写以来 Awk 的变化。该书将于 9 月底上市。同时，还将添加有关 Awk 和相关主题的历史文档、代码片段和文章。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-awk-programming-language-second-edition" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36517525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Clog – Common Lisp Omnificent GUI</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/rabbibotton/clog</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T15 :30:59.250683Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/rabbibotton/clog"/>; <作者>; <name>;marcodiego</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=marcodiego</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e81d3af702b0df68d4af78be7df980845fe6dfc97dee8422a3f5168fe8c4e4be/68747470733a2f2f726162 6269626f74746f6e2e6769746875622e696f2f696d616765732f636c6f672e706e67”样式=“宽度：220px;高度: 220 像素;" />;<br />;Clog 是一个用 Common Lisp 编写的图形用户界面框架。它可以在本地或远程使用，为基于 Web 技术的应用程序生成 GUI，并且可以取代大多数跨平台 GUI 框架和网站框架。该构建器是一个开源项目，并且正在通过新工具和新自定义控件进行积极扩展。你会发现它是多么的快速和简单...... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#clog-the-common-lisp-omnificent-gui" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36520985" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么要写？</stitle>; <id>;https://bastian.rieck.me/blog/posts/2023 /writing_why/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.252491Z</更新>; <link href="https://bastian.rieck.me/blog/posts/2023/writing_why/"/>; <author>; <name>;Pseudomanifold</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Pseudomanifold</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;写作是一种文化技巧以及通过练习变得更好的技能。它有助于理清思路，吸引其他学科的读者，并为研究论文添加叙述。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-write" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36493191" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;泰拉瑞亚内部的 32 位计算机 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXPiqk0-zDY</id>; <更新>;2023-06- 29T14:30:59.252974Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXPiqk0-zDY"/>; <作者>; <name>;lawrenceyan</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lawrenceyan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/zXPiqk0-zDY" 框架边框=“0”allowfullscreen加载=“lazy”>;</iframe>;<a href=“https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-32-bit-computer-inside-terraria-video”target=“_blank” >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36498432" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：构建一个 Discord/Slack 机器人来回答您的文档和 GPT4 的问题</stitle >; <id>;https://www.windmill.dev/blog/knowledge-base-discord-bot</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T14:30:59.253409Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.windmill.dev/blog/knowledge-base-discord-bot"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rubenfiszel </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rubenfiszel </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.windmill.dev/assets/images/ai-bot-48307e19a83c1e9271117857d250897e.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;为您的支持团队提供机器人，使用 Windmill、OpenAI 和 Supabase 回答有关技术文档的问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show- hn-build-a-discord-slack-bot-to-answer-questions-with-your-docs-and-gpt4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36520410" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;隐藏在Python标准库中的CLI工具</stitle>; <id>;https://til.simonwillison.net/python/stdlib-cli-tools</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T02:30:59.253866Z</更新>; <link href="https://til.simonwillison.net/python/stdlib-cli-tools"/>; <作者>; <名称>;swyx</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swyx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com /til.simonwillison.net/b339137492f83f300923b55a039cc0cc.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;Python 标准库包含隐藏的 CLI 工具，可以使用 `python -m name_of_module` 从终端执行这些工具。当系统上未安装某些实用程序时，这些工具非常有用。一些示例这些工具包括用于获取安装信息的“python -m site”、用于有用输出的“python -m module_name”以及用于新闻组访问的“python -m nntplib”。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/#cli-tools-hidden-in-the-python-standard-library" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36515531" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;Tkinter Designer：快速将 Figma 设计转换为 Python Tkinter GUI</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ParthJadhav/Tkinter-Designer</id>; <updated>;2023-06-29T08:30: 59.254273Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ParthJadhav/Tkinter-Designer"/>; <作者>; <name>;yasoob</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=yasoob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42001064/120057695-b1f6c680-c062-11eb-96d5 -2c43d05f9018.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 217px;" />;<br />;Tkinter Designer 的创建是为了加快 Python 中的 GUI 开发过程。它使用著名的设计软件Figma，使用 Python 创建漂亮的 Tkinter GUI 变得轻而易举 🍰。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tkinter-designer-quickly-turn-figma-design-to-python-tkinter-gui" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36517651" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Racket：现代的 Lisp</stitle>; <id>;https://www.deusinmachina.net/p/racket-the-scheme -you-should-try</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.254708Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.deusinmachina.net/p/racket-the-scheme- you-should-try"/>; <author>; <name>;Decabytes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Decabytes</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws. com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F790900ac-a231-4ed9-96a1-4617dd197a6f_972x931.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 211px;" />;<br />;Racket 是一种现代 Lisp，提供一系列功能并支持各种编程范例。它以其简单性、名为 DrRacket 的内置 IDE 和强大的宏功能而闻名。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#racket-lisp-for-the-modern-day" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36519359" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;达美航空航班在没有前起落架的情况下降落在夏洛特</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wbtv.com/2023/06/28/plane-lands-charlotte- douglas-international-airport-after-dealing-with-mechanical-issues/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.255142Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wbtv. com/2023/06/28/plane-lands-charlotte-douglas-international-airport-after-dealing-with-mechanical-issues/"/>; <author>; <name>;iamjfu</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=iamjfu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gray-wbtv-prod.cdn.arcpublishing.com/resizer /ryqFuW2y4RcG101Pd7G3s9huA9c=/800x450/smart/filters:quality(70)/cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/gray/FHAJP3UMSVBIZBXIC3G4J7LLVY.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;达美航空 1092 号航班在没有前起落架的情况下降落在夏洛特道格拉斯国际机场。跑道关闭了几个小时，而机组人员正在努力将飞机移走。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#delta-flight-lands-in-charlotte-without-front-landing-gear" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36519030" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;据报道，FTC 计划对亚马逊提起重大反垄断诉讼</stitle>; <id>;https://nypost.com/2023/06/29/ftc-plans-major-antitrust-lawsuit-against -amazon-report/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T15:30:59.255569Z</更新>; <link href="https://nypost.com/2023/06/29/ftc-plans-major -antitrust-lawsuit-against-amazon-report/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mikece</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikece</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nypost.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/06/NYPICHPDPICT000004768955.jpg?w=1024" style="width: 220px ; height: 147px;" />;<br />;联邦贸易委员会正准备对亚马逊提起重大反垄断诉讼，指控该公司不当利用其主导地位偏袒某些在线商家。该诉讼预计将在重要人员面前提起FTC 8 月份的变更。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ftc-reportedly-plans-major-antitrust-lawsuit-against-amazon" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36521388" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用小型哈希表在 C 中求解“二和”</stitle>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最高法院否决大学招生中的平权行动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/ 2023-06-29/supreme-court-strikes-down-affirmative-action-in-college-admissions</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T14:30:59.256755Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2023-06-29/supreme-court-strikes-down-affirmative-action-in-college-admissions"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbrown </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbrown</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com /dims4/default/e7ca64f/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4000x2667+0+0/resize/1200x800!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com %2F49%2Fa3%2F3b91fd6f480da475373f6fb59f2b%2Fgettyimages-1244419178.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：147px;" />;<br />;最高法院驳回了学院和大学将种族作为招生因素的平权行动政策。法院裁定哈佛大学和北卡罗来纳大学存在基于种族的非法歧视并违反宪法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#supreme-court-strikes-down-affirmative-action-in-college-admissions" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36520658" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;阿斯巴甜将被宣布为可能的致癌物</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dcu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心 —让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aspartame-is-set-to-be-declared-a-possible-carcinogen" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36522471" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;寻找共益企业</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bcorporation.net/en-us/find-ab-corp/ </id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T10:30:59.257534Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bcorporation.net/en-us/find-ab-corp/"/>; <作者>; <name>;adrian_mrd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adrian_mrd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#find-ab-corp" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36518256" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;新的桌面 Outlook 是一个坏主意</stitle>; <id>;https://www.windowscentral.com/software-apps/office-365/new-desktop-outlook-is-a-bad-idea-heres-为什么</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T14:30:59.257910Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.windowscentral.com/software-apps/office-365/new-desktop-outlook -is-a-bad-idea-heres-why"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thesuperbigfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thesuperbigfrog</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/y8PhK2r88xh7EQErJDUGPZ-320-80.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;新的桌面 Outlook 是一个坏主意，因为它不支持本地 Microsoft Exchange，而且用户抵制更改。微软的长期目标是用新版本，但这可能会是一个坎坷的旅程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-new-desktop-outlook-is-a-bad-idea" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36520580" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;海洋中巨大的“重力洞”可能是远古海洋的幽灵</stitle>; <id >;https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/giant-gravity-hole-in-the-ocean-may-be-the-ghost-of-an-ancient-sea1/</id>; <更新>;2023- 06-29T07:30:59.258283Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/giant-gravity-hole-in-the-ocean-may-be-the-ghost-of -an-ancient-sea1/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;_Microft</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_Microft</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://static.scientificamerican.com/sciam/assets/Image/2023/grl65804-fig-0001-mCROP.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;印度洋上有一个巨大的“洞”，地球重力低于平均水平。它是由古代海洋边缘非洲深处的熔岩羽流造成的床。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#giant-gravity-hole-in-the-ocean-may-be-the-ghost-of-an-an-ancient-sea" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36494484" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;扩展 Linear 的同步引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://linear.app/博客/scaling-the-linear-sync-engine</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.258665Z</更新>; <link href="https://linear.app/blog/scaling-the -线性同步引擎"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tommoor</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tommoor</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/ornj730p/product/6462649088b7997ce630fce609f3c8ee7e970bb5-1400x996.png?w=460&q=95&auto=format&dpr=2" style="width: 220px; height: 157px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了扩展 Linear 实时同步引擎所面临的挑战以及 API 如何因此而发展。它还重点介绍了 Linear 应用程序中同步引擎的当前功能。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scaling-linear-s-sync-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36519448" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;艾德·弗雷德金去世了</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/dag_spicer/status/1673799376437927936</id>; <updated>;2023-06-29T03:30:59.259076 Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/dag_spicer/status/1673799376437927936"/>; <author>; <name>;masswerk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=masswerk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/#ed-fredkin-has-died" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36508842" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;潜艇专​​家试图劝阻 OceanGate 首席执行官不要在泰坦接受客户</stitle>; <id>;https://www.insider.com/submersible-expert-oceangate-ceo-hull-defect-will-only-get-worse-2023-6< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.259479Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.insider.com/submersible-expert-oceangate-ceo-hull-defect-will-only -get-worse-2023-6"/>; <作者>; <名称>;雅克斯姆</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jacquesm</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>;<img src=“https://i.insider.com/6491f60265b9ce0018a436a2?width=700”样式=“宽度：220px;高度：110px;" />;<br />;大约四年前，OceanGate 的泰坦潜水器在上周潜入泰坦尼克号沉船时发生内爆，一位曾乘坐该船旅行的潜水器专家向该公司首席执行官发出了绝望的警告：需要更多测试。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#submarine-expert-tried-to-dissuade-oceangate-ceo-from-take-customers-in-titan" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36519442" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Kagi 筹集了 67 万美元</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.kagi.com/ safe-round</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T07:30:59.259866Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.kagi.com/safe-round"/>; <作者>; <名称>;erwinmatijsen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=erwinmatijsen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Kagi 已通过 SAFE 票据成功筹集 67 万美元这轮投资是我们迄今为止的首次外部融资。筹集的资金将成为加速我们新产品和现有产品计划的催化剂。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kagi-raises-670k" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36517149" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;注意到应用程序仅托管在 us-east-1</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jonlu.ca/posts/us-east-1-latency</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T04:30:59.260255Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jonlu.ca/posts/us-east-1-latency"/>; <作者>; <名称>; jonluca</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jonluca</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog. jonlu.ca/images/ generated/va-aus-800-49883ae13.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：148px；" />;<br />;用户体验的速度受源站与用户物理距离的影响。在 us-east-1 中部署应用程序可能会导致美国以外的用户性能下降。使用全局 CDN 有助于提高性能，但许多应用程序仍然拥有集中式服务器或数据库集群。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#noticing-when-an-app-is-only-hosted-in-us-east-1" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36511012" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;棒球大小的冰雹摧毁了斯科茨布拉夫太阳能发电场</stitle>; <id>;https://cowboystatedai​​ly.com/2023/06/ 27/棒球大小的冰雹砸入面板-at-150-mph-destroys-scottsbluff-solar-farm/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T11:30:59.260652Z</更新>; <链接 href="https://cowboystatedai​​ly.com/2023/06/27/baseball-sized-hail-smashing-into-panels-at-150-mph-destroys-scottsbluff-solar-farm/"/>; <作者>; <name>;rufus_foreman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rufus_foreman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /cowboystatedai​​ly.imgix.net/Bloomberg-Panels-6.27.23.jpg?ixlib=js-3.8.0&q=75&auto=format%2Ccompress" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;冰雹打碎了这个 5.2 兆瓦太阳能项目的大部分面板，幸免于难的是一块奇怪的面板，就像白色微笑中缺失的牙齿一样。怀俄明州只有一个商业规模的太阳能发电厂，但第二个项目正在夏延以南建设。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#baseball-sized-hail-destroys-scottsbluff-solar-farm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36519006" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;寻找一款简单的智能手表</stitle>; <id>;https://www.binarymoon.co.uk/writing/the-quest-for-a- simple-smartwatch/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T03:30:59.261078Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.binarymoon.co.uk/writing/the-quest-for- a-simple-smartwatch/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ingve</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://www.binarymoon.co.uk/cache/resize/980a8033-garmin-forerunner-55-800x2000-g.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：237px； ” />;<br />;我值得信赖的旧智能手表最近停止工作，所以我决定寻找一个简单的替代品。经过几个小时的搜索，我最终选择了 Garmin Forerunner 55，它非常符合我的需求。然而，我不得不禁用许多我永远不会使用的健身跟踪功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-quest-for-a-simple-smartwatch" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36498632" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最后一刻政府修正案旨在压制 DPC 批评者（爱尔兰）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.iccl.ie/news/last-million-government -amendment-seeks-to-muzzle-dpc-critics/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-29T12:30:59.261484Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.iccl.ie/news /last-minute-government-amendment-seeks-to-muzzle-dpc-critics/"/>; <author>; <name>;donohoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=多诺霍</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.iccl.ie/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/DPC-plate-900x450.jpg"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；” />;<br />;爱尔兰政府对一项法案添加了一项修正案，旨在平息对数据保护委员会 (DPC) 的批评。该修正案将阻止人们谈论 DPC 如何处理投诉以及大型科技公司如何滥用数据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#last-minute-government-amendment-seeks-to-muzzle-dpc-critics-ireland" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36519311" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
